# TableColumnBody

**Associated Type**

The type of content representing the body of this table column content.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype TableColumnBody : TableColumnContent
```

## Getting the column body

- **tableColumnBody**: The composition of content that comprise the table column content.

items.description: The composition of content that comprise the table column content.
items.name: tableColumnBody
